attributes.action: Make Gyms and Fitness centres an essential service.
attributes.additional_details: Since the start of lockdown many people mental health has deteriorated without access to a gym. Many people I've spoken to use it as a way to let off any stress they may have accumulated or just to feel like they're not trapped inside their mind 24/7. Every gym that I've been to has abided by your rules and the rate of infection has been almost nonexistent especially when compared to other places deemed essential.
attributes.background: Allow gyms and fitness centres to open throughout the lockdown as being fit and healthy lowers risk of covid 19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
